description:
Season Eight Match
SERENA BLAIR
The Jockey
HT: 5'0
WT: 100 lbs
Season record (0-0)
Lifetime record (0-0)BELLA ROSSI
The Annihilator
HT: 5'5
WT: 155lbs
Season record (1-0)
Lifetime record (5-1)
Welcome Serena Blair to the Ultimate Surrender mat. The sexy little wrestler is 100% spirit and energy. For a rookie going against a top ranked opponent, she did well. Serena scored, she held control, she got style points, and she is only 100lbs! The featherweight division is looking well rounded these days.
Bella Rossi, the fan favorite, takes the mat for the second time this year. The Annihilator has lost only one regular season match in her career. Bella takes her wrestling seriously, and is looking forward to a good position this year in the Summer Vengeance tournament
Serena fought well and fought hard. She scored style and even held control, however when the Annihilator decides it's time for you to eat mat, you will. Serena is abused, beaten and humiliated on the mat. She is finger fucked, gets a face full of pussy and in the end is just another fuck toy for the powerful Bella to use and abuse as she sees fit in RD4. Welcome to Ultimate Surrender, rookie!
title: New rookie on the mat gets a face full of humilation & monster tits
